Q_DESC:
Ram planned to buy books from SRM publications

The book details are as follows:
Book 1 title : C Programming

Book 1 subject : C Programming Tutorial

Book 2 author : Zara Ali
Book 2 subject : Telecom Billing Tutorial

Display the same using structure concept.

The input input corresponds to the number of Books

Mandatory:

You should use struct keyword and the name of  the structure should be Books.
Otherwise you wont get 100% evaluation.
